name: Stardust Kids
description:
Relise date: 11 Nov 2017 
Duration: 2-10 hours 
Language: English, Russian
Synopsis: Deputy head of the UFO study club wasn’t prepared for what the inspection of club’s property will bring. The long-awaited summer break has to be postponed until Kurt finds the lost item — a home planetarium.
A story about friendship and bonding under starry sky. 

Autors:  
Hazukashii Team
